WebXR support system for A-frame

XR

  • xr/basic source

    Use A-frame to show Hello WebVR in XR

AR

  • ar/hit_test source

    Use A-frame to find anchors by searching on tap events

  • ar/reticle source

    Use A-frame to have a reticle on AR mode

  • ar/light source

    Use A-frame to have a reticle with light estimate on AR mode
